titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

scopecontent.p: These materials appear to have been collected by Wilbur H. Oda and largely consist of Pennsylvania German miscellany. Included are a copybook, verse in high German and Pennsylvania German dialect, prints made from woodcuts, miscellaneous items pertaining to Keystone State Normal School in Kutztown, and newspaper clippings and religious pamphlets, many of which are written in German.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Library Company of Philadelphia: Wilbur Oda collection
